entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
